New films and DVDs for June 2016

Written by Brandon King · Published May 31, 2016

The revenant

Leonardo DiCaprio won his long-awaited Best Actor Oscar for his performance of Hugh Glass, an American frontiersman in the 1820s

Deadpool

Deadpool (Ryan Reynolds) is the alter ego of Wade Wilson, a mercenary who has healing powers and a dark sense of humour.

Alvin and the Chipmunks: road chip

The chipmunk trio return in this animated road adventure, in an attempt to stop Dave (Jason Lee) from proposing to his girlfriend.

Dad's army

This movie adaptation of the popular 1970s TV series recruits new faces including Catherine Zeta-Jones, Bill Nighy and Blake Harrison.

How to be single

Starring Rebel Wilson and Dakota Johnson, a group of single, young people in New York City navigate their way around relationships in this comedy.

Triple nine

This star-studded crime thriller, corrupt cops have to divert the police force with the Triple 9 code - officer down - while they pull off a heist.
